name: The path of sacred roots.
description:
Travel to the deepest placest in the sacred roots, where the discord have been unleashed by you, born from the roots but banished from your realm , you must fix your mistakes.

Make your way to the holy terrains again, and defeat evil ants in the way to be forgiven by the gods.

This game was made for the 48 hour challenge of Global Game Jam!

It's very unfinished, actually, it's just the "Sketch", but we liked the project so much we'll actually finish it, so, stay tunned to watch the next updates!

for now, it's just a technical demo, and not a game at all
